workflow.name: XDR-1096-WF Limit for Category and Calendar Automation
workflow.title: XDR-1096-WF Limit for Category and Calendar Automation

properties.name: Enter the Limit for Calendar Object type
Enter the tenant ID to set the Limits at Org Level
Overall TestStatus for Category and Calendar Limits

properties.description:
UseCases 

Set the Limits for calendar and Category to 3 

1st Group - Calendar -- Set Value for 3  

Create DateList Calendar 4 times , 3 times should pass 4th should fail Limit reached error Message
Delete DateList Calendar 
Create Recurring Calendar for 4 time , 3 times should pass 4th should fail Limit reached error Message
Delete Recurring Calendar 
Calendar -- Set Value for 4
Create Group Calendar for 5 time , 4 times should pass 5th should fail Limit reached error Message
Delete Group Calendar 
Calendar -- Set Value for 2
Create TimeRange Calendar for 2 time , 2 times should pass 3rd should fail Limit reached error Message
Delete TimeRange Calendar 

2nd Group -- Set Category to 3
Create basic Category 3 times , 4th should fail with Limit reached errror message 
Delete basic Category 
Set Category to 4
Create Xchange Category 4 times , 5th should fail with Limit reached errror message (Xchange Manager Permission)
Delete Xchange Category
properties.display_name: XDR-1096-WF Limit for Category and Calendar Automation

properties.workflow_name: XDR-1096-Update Object Limits at Org Level

blocks.name: Condition Branch
blocks.title: Exit Loop when Loop Reached

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

blocks.name: Condition Branch
blocks.title: Limit is Reached and user cannot create Objects

properties.display_name: Limit is Reached and user cannot create Objects

actions.name: Break
actions.title: Break the loop if Limit is reached

properties.display_name: Break the loop if Limit is reached

blocks.name: Condition Branch
blocks.title: Limit is not Reached and user can create Objects
